channel.title: S2+ Jonin Exam
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "S2+ Jonin Exam" - silver elixir question

item.title: Re: S2+ Jonin Exam
item.content:encoded: Arena Favorite will help with Sannin runs, though.

item.title: Re: S2+ Jonin Exam
item.content:encoded:
Silver Elixir is added directly to your Daily EXP, so yes, it will help.

I'm fairly certain that Arena Favorite won't, as it doesn't apply it's bonus to your XP from missions, and it states that it applies it's bonus to your Daily EXP at the end of the day.

item.title: S2+ Jonin Exam
item.content:encoded: Will using a silver elixir help me out for the 500k xp portion of the Jonin exam? Or is that bonus only applied towards the end of day ranking? The same question applies to the Arena Favorite item.
